1.0.name: wordpress/widgetable
1.0.description:
This plugin is geared for sidebars on a company website or non-blog sections of your website. It allows you to create reuseable text widgets, add custom logic with shortcodes or anything else you can do in the TinyMCE editor.

It creates a custom post type of Widget and adds a meta box with some select boxes to the edit page. A setting in: Settings -> Widgetable allows you to specify how many select boxes to show. Easily add the Widgetable Widget to your sidebar and you're done.
